last_scene: Artie Penhaligon, a cynical office worker, was electrocuted while trying to retrieve a stuck bag of chips from a vending machine using a LARP sword.

His soul was then pulled into a digital void where a snarky System interface began his character creation process.
key_events: Artie is introduced as a cynical office drone carrying a LARP prop (Rusty Shortsword).

Artie dies and his consciousness enters the System Void.
